short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn languages having fun with lyrics of your favorite YouTube Songs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you love music? So do we!

What if we told you that you can learn languages while listening to and enjoying your favorite songs on YouTube?

With SongWord, you can practice your listening skills and improve your vocabulary by filling in AI-generated missing words and following along with the song's subtitles!

Make the most of your time by enjoying the sounds you love while learning languages!
